summary: Having been adopted by the madam of a southwestern brothel, a now adult Adrian must cope with the fact that he's Satan's kid, and not living up to his expectations.
cast: Stephen McHattie|Patty Duke|Broderick Crawford|Ruth Gordon|Lloyd Haynes|David Huffman|Tina Louise|George Maharis|Ray Milland|Donna Mills|Beverly Sanders|Brian Richards|Buck Young|Philip Boyer|D.J. Sullivan|Andy Stone|Calvin Rose
keywords: returning character killed off|violence|returning character with different actress|returning character with different actor|satanic cult
title: ¿Qué pasó con el bebé de Rosemary?
